OrgName: Michael G. Wilson and Co., Inc.
activities: Michael G. Wilson and Co., Inc (MGW) provides a range of research and development consulting services in worldwide clinical research for the development of pharmaceutical products and medical devices. During the conduct of its business, MGW processes personal data relating to study participants and study investigators, in addition to employee data. Due to the global nature of its activities MGW may transfer personal data between members of the European Union and the United States.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association or EU Data Protection Authorities are available to investigate unresolved complaints.
